title: Active Boys
overview: This is the story of two clubs of the International School – music and basketball, which, due to the uneven distribution of club funding, began their confrontation with each other. Min Lam, the head of the music club, and Hoang Dang, the head of the basketball club, challenged each other to find a team worthy of school funding. The music club will have to become basketball players fighting on the court, and the basketball club opposite will have to sing, dance and perform music. During a confrontation between the main characters of the enemies are converted into friends.  But before the old conflict is resolved, a new one is born. Many questions arise: will they be able to overcome conflicts and barriers to love? What will two talented guys and their club members do to find a solution and live in harmony under the roof of the school?
